body_html:
The workflow sound correct - as soon you load the dll with your ops the static initializers will register the op and they should be available in c++. Some people around me are actively using this.
@stefanseibert, is this working for you after your last update?

body:
The workflow sound correct - as soon you load the dll with your ops the static initializers will register the op and they should be available in c++. Some people around me are actively using this.
@stefanseibert, is this working for you after your last update?
